name: Graduation Day
description: Graduation Day is an epic 2.5D fighting game where high school leavers celebrate their last day of school with a fight. School rivalries are escalated with this epic showdown to finalize once and for all which school dominates all others. Familiar schools are selectable in the game, each with special moves such as the Hurricane Kick and chain hit combos. There are five selectable stages each with something new from a classroom to a farm! Arcade Mode features a fun and exciting story line where you must defeat a line of foes before you reach the final boss - The Headmaster! Graduation Day also features an exciting 2 player mode where you can fight against your friends or family. And even if you have no one to play with, fight against the computer to improve your skills.
